attributes.action: Introduce juries into family courts to ensure fairer, more balanced decisions.
attributes.additional_details: Judges can make mistakes, hold unconscious biases, or overlook evidence. In complex family cases, it’s wrong to rely on one person. A jury ensures fairness, prevents bias, and guarantees all evidence is properly heard. In emotionally and legally complex family cases, it’s unacceptable to leave decisions to one person. Judges can be wrong or biased, and placing all that power on one person risks serious mistakes and undue pressure.
attributes.background: Reform the family court system to include a jury of impartial civilians who can deliberate on evidence, hear from children, and help ensure just outcomes in cases that impact families.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704891
